In the si lent mid night watch es, List! thy bro ther calls to thee;
Thous and souls are sad ly drift ing On the dark tem pes tuous sea.

Thou hast heard the Mas ter's prom ise: "If ye fol low I will make
You to be come fish ers of men;" For the wand'ring soul's dear sake.

Cast out now your heav'n ly net work At the Mas ter's gra cious word;
